snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 4,470 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war and 1,789 who have died as part of the Afghan war and related operations.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 4,470 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war and 1,789 who have died as part of the Afghan war and related operations.
